metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13632 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
ext/fts3/fts3_snippet.c in SQLite before 3.32.0 has a NULL pointerdereference via a crafted matchinfo() query.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13632` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-0 - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
sqlite3 - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1').
